# state

**Instance Property**

The machine-specific thread state.

## Declaration

```swift
var state: es_token_t
```

## Discussion

This equivalent to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/thread_state_t] in Mach APIs.



## Inspecting Thread State

- **flavor**: An indication of the representation of the machine-specific thread state.
- **es_token_t**: An arbitrary buffer of data with its size.
